text: 5.35 Sng 48.2, Ais 66.1 Pen nɨbi ñɨn dad aplanɨl lum awl ak yomɨl, yepɨs ma apin, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agɨl, takaw anɨgɨl ma agɨnɨmɨb agak. Ak God tob ne lep ak mɨdeb agak. Pen nɨbi ñɨn dad aplanɨl Jelusalem ak yomɨl, yepɨs ma apin, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agɨl, takaw anɨgɨl ma agɨnɨmɨb agak. Ak Bɨawl kɨles tɨmel ak man awl ne yɨbɨl mɨdeb agak.
